items.name: Small Salad
items.desc: Small salad with mixed leafy greens, chopped onions, and tomatoes.

items.name: Large Salad
items.desc: Large salad with romaine lettuce and up to 5 of the following ingredients of your choice and a dressing: chicken, bacon, parmesean cheese, tomatoes, chopped onions, roasted herbs, cranberries, mixed fruits, feta cheese.

items.name: Small Garden Salad
items.desc: No meat small salad with leafy greens and various mixed vegetables.

items.name: Large Garden Salad
items.desc: No meat large salad with leafy greens and various mixed vegetables.

items.name: 3 Scoop Sampler
items.desc: Large salad with up to three scoops of your choice of chicken salads.

items.name: Chef Salad
items.desc: Lettuce, ham, turkey, chicken, tuna, or roast beef, hard-boiled eggs, cucumber, cheese, and tomatoes.

items.name: Cup of Soup
items.desc: Small cup of soup of your choosing, warmed to your desire.

items.name: Bowl of Soup
items.desc: Medium sized cup of soup of your choosing, warmed to your desire.

items.name: Quart of Soup
items.desc: Large cup of soup of your choosing, warmed to your desire.

items.name: Gallon of Soup
items.desc: Humongous cup of soup of your choosing, warmed to your deepest desire.
